fxInfo_clarification: Missing data within a time-series is interpolated using linear interpolation.
fxInfo_question: What is the annual inflation rate?
fxInfo_sources: Clio Infra (clio-infra.eu), based on Arroyo Abad, Davies and van Zanden (N.d.), MontevideoOxford Latin America Economic History Database (http://moxlad.fcs.edu.uy/es/basededatos.html), De Zwart (2011a), De Zwart (2011b), Reinhart and Rogoff (2011), Santing (N.d.), World Bank(2013).
name: e_miinflat
